event.description: The event for the discussion which should be an enum, COMMUNITY_CALL.

isActive.description: Indicator whether the call is currently active.

startTime.description: ISO8601 of when the meeting started.

endTime.description: ISO8601 of when the meeting ended.

discordUserId.description: Discord Id of the user that is configured to use this command.

voiceChannelName.description: The name for the voice/stage channel

minAttendance.description: Minimum attendance time required in minutes.
